Title: Requires cosmetology licensees to disclose the price of cosmetology services at booking and prior to the start such services
Summary: Requires cosmetology licensees to disclose the price of cosmetology services at booking and prior to the start of such services.
LawCode: Add ยง404-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring cosmetology licensees to disclose the price of cosmetology services at booking and prior to the start of such services
